Name: Brass Knuckles
Description: Adds bludgeoning damage to unarmed strikes

Name: Gloves
Description: Standard gloves

Name: Chain Mittens
Description: cannot cast spells but +1 DR. Medium Armor

Name: Gauntlets
Description: Penalty of -5 to Dex, but +1 DR.  Cannot cast spells.  Adds two bludgeoning damage to unarmed strikes

Name: Boots
Description: Standard boots

Name: Sabatons
Description: Boots that count as heavy armor. +1 DR, -5 ft movespeed.

Name: Waders
Description: Resistant to effects of surfaces

Name: Spurred boots
Description: Bonus to your mount's morale and movespeed

Name: Buckler
Description: parry reaction granting +2 DR

Name: Atlatl
Description: Double range and +1 damage with thrown weapons

Name: Rucksack
Description: Carry up to 12 items

Name: Bookbag
Description: Carry 6 of any item and up to 6 scrolls or books. Comes with a random scroll

Name: Duffel Bag
Description: Carry up to 9 items

Name: Hydration Pack
Description: Carry up to 6 of any item with 6 slots specifically for liquids

Name: Crossbody Bag
Description: Carry up to 6 items

Name: Handbag
Description: Carry up to 3 items

Name: Belt
Description: Hold up to 3 items for quick access

Name: Fanny Pack
Description: Additional storage space on the belt, at the cost of style

Name: Bandolier
Description: Has 6 slots but can only hold ammunition (including throwables)

Name: Books
Description: Take time to read, but can give your character new familiarities(tags) with an int check

Name: Mounts
Description: Steeds just count as temp hp

effect_size: Carry 6 of any item and up to 6 scrolls or books. Comes with a random scroll
Carry up to 6 of any item with 6 slots specifically for liquids

Icon: Belt items can be used without an additional action to draw them. Ammo must be in a belt slot.
May remove bc want some restrictions on ranged users
effect_size: 3 Belt slots that can only hold ammunition

Name: Other Items
Description: Effect

Name: Hearthstone
Description: Transforms into a shelter, allowing a user to gain a rest while out in the wilds

Name: Mirage Cloak
Description: Projects a 1 hp 0 DR copy of you, which enemies may target for attacks.

Name: Orphic Lute
Description: Animates objects, adding them the party for 1 minute

Name: Phasewalker boots
Description: Can no clip through walls

Name: Tempest bottle
Description: Summons a lightning storm when used

Name: Blizzard Bottle
Description: Summons a snowstorm

Name: Horse whisper Collar
Description: Allows user to speak with animals
